title: Treasure room

properties.name: description
properties.value: The Treasure room is a room in Player-owned house that can be used to contain a reward for players who reach it and kill the guardian. It can only be built underground and requires level 75 Construction and 250,000.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Treasure room
For a list of all items and upgrades within the Construction skill, see Construction/Level up table.
Treasure room
Released31 May 2006 (Update)
Icon
Construction level75
Cost250,000
Door layout
Treasure room

The Treasure room is a room in Player-owned house that can be used to contain a reward for players who reach it and kill the guardian. It can only be built underground and requires level 75 Construction and 250,000.

There are 5 hotspots available:

  • Decoration space
  • Door space
  • Lighting space
  • Monster space
  • Treasure space

Contents

  • 1 Decoration
  • 2 Door
  • 3 Lighting
  • 4 Monster
  • 5 Treasure

Decoration[edit | edit source]

Level Decoration Materials Experience Cost
66 Round shield Oak plank x2 120 930
72 Decorative blood Red dye x4 4 1,272
76 Square shield Teak plank x4 360 3,420
83 Decorative pipe Steel bar x6 120 2,592
86 Kite shield Mahogany plank x3 420 6,408
94 Hanging skeleton Skull x2
Bones x6 		3 462

Door[edit | edit source]

Players have to pick the lock (using Thieving) or force the lock (using Strength) to open dungeon doors. Higher level doors are more difficult to open.

Level Door Materials Experience Cost
74 Oak door Oak plank x10 600 4,650
84 Steel-plated door Oak plank x10
Steel bar x10 		800 8,970
94 Marble door Marble block x4 2,000 1,328,624

Lighting[edit | edit source]

Level Lighting Materials Experience Cost
72 Candle Oak plank x4
Lit candle x4 		243 3,040
84 Torches Oak plank x4
Lit torch x4 		244 1,880
94 Skull torches Oak plank x4
Lit torch x4
Skull x4 		246 1,880

Monster[edit | edit source]

The guardian monster has to be killed before a player can get the treasure.

Level Guard Combat level Experience Cost
75 Demon 82 707 500,000
80 Kalphite soldier 85 866 750,000
85 Tok-Xil 135 2,236 5,000,000
90 Dagannoth 135 2,738 7,500,000
95 Steel dragon 246 3,162 10,000,000
99 [1] Rune dragon 380 5,000 25,000,000
  1. ^ The rune dragon also requires completion of Dragon Slayer II.

Treasure[edit | edit source]

The treasure can only be opened once the guardian has been killed, and can store a maximum of 1,500. In addition, house owners must wait five minutes between adding treasure to their chest.

If players have more than one treasure chest, then they act as one; adding coins to one fills them both, and opening either one gives access to the full treasure.

Level Treasure chest Materials Experience Cost
75 Wooden crate Plank x5
Nails x5 		143 1,440 - 5,510[1]
79 Oak chest Oak plank x5
Steel bar x2 		340 3,189
83 Teak chest Teak plank x5
Steel bar x4 		530 6,003
87 Mahogany chest Mahogany plank x5
Gold leaf 		1,000 146,773
91 Magic chest Magic stone 1,500 994,511
  1. ^ Cost changes depending on the type of nails used.
